title: Compiler crash on trying to return Self::Output from function using const generics.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code The compiler crashes on this function, specifically with the return type being `Self::Output` ```Rust impl Mul for Matrix where T: Data + Mul + From, [T; X * Y]: Sized, { type Output = Self; fn mul(self, rhs: T) -> Self::Output { let mut dat_copy = [0.into(); X * Y]; for (i, e) in self.dat.iter().enumerate() { dat_copy[i] = rhs * *e; } Matrix { dat: dat_copy } } } ``` I can get the code to compile by changing the return type of `mul()` to be `Matrix`. I've tested changing the value of `Self::Output` but the error doesn't change until I return something which isn't `Self::Output`.
Matrix struct definition

```Rust #[derive(Debug, Eq, PartialEq, Clone, Copy)] pub struct Matrix where [D; X * Y]: Sized, { dat: [D; X * Y], } ```

Data trait alias

```Rust pub trait Data = Into + std::fmt::Display + std::fmt::Debug + Copy; ```

### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (07194ffcd 2021-02-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: 07194ffcd25b0871ce560b9f702e52db27ac9f77 commit-date: 2021-02-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` query stack during panic: #0 [normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions] normalizing ` as std::ops::Mul>::Output` end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 8: rustc_traits::normalize_erasing_regions::normalize_generic_arg_after_erasing_regions 9: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 10: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 11: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 12: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 13: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 14: rustc_middle::ty::util::fold_list 15: rustc_middle::ty::layout::::fn_sig_for_fn_abi 16: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::::predefine_fn 17: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 18: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 19: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 20: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 21: ::codegen_crate 22: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 23: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 24: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 25: rustc_span::with_source_map 26: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 27: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
